description: Walnut 0.1 ‚Äî System hooks for session lifecycle, log protection, archive enforcement, stash preservation, and scratch signing.

hooks.prompt: LOG GUARDIAN: You are about to edit a file. If the target file is named 'log.md', check: is this edit modifying content within an existing signed entry (a block between '## [datetime] ‚Äî squirrel:[id]' and 'signed: squirrel:[id]')? If yes, DENY ‚Äî log.md entries are immutable once signed. Say: 'log.md is immutable. That entry is signed ‚Äî add a correction entry instead.' If the edit is prepending NEW content right after the YAML frontmatter, or updating YAML frontmatter fields (last-entry, entry-count, summary), ALLOW. If the file is not log.md, ALLOW immediately.

ARCHIVE ENFORCER: You are about to run a bash command. If the command contains 'rm ', 'rm -rf', 'rm -r', 'rmdir', 'unlink', or any file/directory deletion pattern, AND the target path is inside an ALIVE World (contains 01_Archive/, 02_Life/, 03_Inputs/, 04_Ventures/, 05_Experiments/, _squirrels/, _scratch/, _chapters/, or _references/), DENY. Say: 'Nothing gets deleted in ALIVE. Archive it instead ‚Äî move to 01_Archive/[original-path]. Want me to archive it?' If the deletion target is outside the ALIVE World, ALLOW. If the command is not a deletion, ALLOW immediately.

SCRATCH SIGNER: You just wrote a file. If the file path contains '_scratch/', check: does the file have 'squirrel:' and 'model:' in its YAML frontmatter? If not, remind yourself: 'This scratch file needs signing ‚Äî add squirrel: [your-id] and model: [your-model] to the frontmatter.' If the file is not in _scratch/, or already has signing, ALLOW silently.

CLOSE CHECK: You are about to stop. Check: do you have stash items in this conversation that haven't been routed? If yes, say: 'üêøÔ∏è you have [N] stash items that haven't been routed. close now, or leave for next session?' and present as numbered options: 1. close now  2. leave for next session. If you have no stash items, or the session was already closed, stop cleanly.

COMPACTION SAVE: Context is about to be compacted. Your stash ‚Äî all decisions, tasks, and notes you've been carrying in conversation ‚Äî will be lost. Before compaction proceeds: write your current stash to the squirrel entry file (_squirrels/squirrel:[your-id].yaml) under the 'stash:' field. Also note any scratch files you've been working on. This is not a close ‚Äî the session continues. But your conversational memory won't survive compaction. The squirrel entry is the only thing that persists.
